external_references.source_name: Jamie Tarabay and Katrina Manson December 2023
external_references.description: Jamie Tarabay and Katrina Manson. (2023, December 22). Iranian-Linked Hacks Expose Failure to Safeguard US Water System. Retrieved March 25, 2024.

objects.description: During the [Unitronics Defacement Campaign](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0031), the [CyberAv3ngers](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1027) caused multiple businesses to halt operations due to the unavailability of the [Programmable Logic Controller (PLC)](https://attack.mitre.org/assets/A0003) and [Human-Machine Interface (HMI)](https://attack.mitre.org/assets/A0002). These victims covered multiple sectors.(Citation: Jamie Tarabay and Katrina Manson December 2023)
